msbt.message: Oh, uh, hi. Do you live here? I'm Flick.I'mkind of a bug buff. An insect enthusiast. An arthropod artiste. <10_5 />I love all bugs and their appendages! I've been traveling across all the islands looking for my soul bug— the perfect inspiration for my art! I must capture every wiggling leg, each joint of the antenna! We're so lucky to live in their world
Oh! Y-yeah, of course. But if you, you know, change your mind, I'll be here until tomorrow, so
Oh! Y-yeah, of course. But if you, you know, change your mind, I'll be here until , so

Oh, hey. Remember meFlick?The guy who loves bugs in all their skittery, chittery, sometimes-glittery glory? I'm still looking for my soul bug, the one to be my artistic inspiration and lift me to ever moreart.

So if you find a bug, will you sell it to me? I can pay a little extra—no price is too high for my chitinous kindred! And that's ANY bug. Devotion with conditions isn't devotion at all!Ohand if you're, um, interested in my art at all, just let me know. My commissions are open!
I've got a bug to sell!
Commissions?
Maybe another time.

So if you find a bug, will you sell it to me? I can pay a little extra—no price is too high for my chitinous kindred! And that's ANY bug. Devotion with conditions isn't devotion at all!Ohand if you're, um, interested in my art at all, just let me know. My commissions are open!
I've got a bug to sell!
Commission a piece.
Maybe another time.
Oh! Um, hi. Have you caught any bugs yet?I'm happy to buy any kind of bug you catch. And if you want to commission some of my art, just let me know.
I've got a bug to sell!
Commissions?
Maybe another time.

R-really?! That's great! What have you got for me?!Wait—you don't have the energy, the aura, the <10_5 />MAJESTY of someone with bugs in their pockets! Sorry, but I can only buy bugs that, you know, exist. But, um, come back when you've caught some!
Just so you know, I have to leave tomorrow morning at 5 AM, so please get back to me by then, OK?
Just so you know, I have to leave at 5 AM, soplease get back to me by then, OK?
Huh? Oh, um, sorry. Just, y'know, thinking.So, have you found any bugs yet? I'll buy any kind—no questions asked.
I've got a bug to sell!
Tell me about your art.
Maybe another time.
Oh! Um, sorry. Lost in my thoughtsHave you found any bugs yet? 'Cause I'll buy any kind. Any. Kind.Oh, and if you want to commission a piece of my art just let me know OK bye.
I've got a bug to sell!
Tell me about your art.
Maybe another time.
Really? <10_5 />WHAT KIND?!
What?!No, it's cool. It was enough to justbehold.
You're not gonna show me?! B-butNo, I get it. I cannot choose when I meet each bug. The mandible of destiny is afoot here.
I'm off to the next island tomorrow at Maybe you'll have a bug for me by then?
I'm off to the next island at Maybe you'll have a bug for me by then?
! Be shrill my squee-ing heart! It's <10_5 />so beautiful! Keep it cool, Flick Your Would you, perchance, sell it to me for, oh, ?
Sell! Sell!
On second thought...
A whole swarm?! This is the best day EVER! OK, tone it down, FlickAhem. Can I offer you, say, for the bunch of them?
Sell! Sell!
On second thought...
Really?! Th-thank you!
Let me know if you catch any more!

Hey, um, thanks for hanging out with me. I don't talk with a lot of folksexcept my partner.Have you ever competed in a Bug-Off? I wasgonna host one this weekend on the island. You should totally enter! You'll be able to feel the energy of bugs in your very skin!
If you find yourself where there are no bugsyou have to visualize and manifest them yourself! Close your eyes. Reach with your mind. Feel the bugs. Feel them crawling all over your skin. Dissolve.
My world was once gray and dull. Then they brought their riotous jointed rainbows of wonder!
It doesn't matter how much I treasure the bugs. They'll never notice what I do for them
They reflect this sullied world, yet retain their own beauty I am bewitched by those compound eyes.
It is sheer hubris to think that we could ever learn everything about bugs. Bugs are an experience. They are a conversationone between the viewer and the universe.
Larva, pupa, adulthood, final transcendence They become more exalted with every metamorphosis!
Am I truly listening to the needs of the with every ear I possess?
When the universe contemplates beauty, it imagines the silhouette of the .
Will this world meet its reckoning, beheld only by the lonely eyes of the ?
If were to manifest before me, how would I react? Laughter? Weeping?

I divide myself into the three sacred segments. I am the head, thorax, and abdomen of the universe Huh? Did you hear that? Um, never mind. You're not from this island, are you? The bugs here don't know you. Me? I'm Flick. I'ma fan of our six- legged friends. They inspire me. Some call methe Arthropod Artiste! If you have come here looking for bugs, then you'll be competing with me for their attentions! Be warned, though—bugs tend to be shy around those they don't know.
Wait! I just heard the scuttling aria of arthropod legs on a hard surface!<10_4 /> I must have misheard it
I've been traveling from island to island looking for expressive bugs. It's been an emotional journey. I wonder what kind of segmented friends I'll make here?
I'm sure I'll make it to your island eventually.When that happens, will you introduce me to some of your local bugs and their ways?

This is about your commission for a sculpture based on the exquisite , right? I have the image in my mind! Now my mortal digits must bring it forth before this flame is extinguished! When the final piece has manifested itself beyond the limitations of my frame, I'll, uh, mail it your house.

Oh! A-are you interested?!I consider it my mission to bring the bugs' beautyhowever imperfectly to places they haven't yet blessed. A bug's form is whole and complete from the moment of its creation, while we poor observers are flawed. I seek to capture a shadow of that form, and while I do need live models to work from, I don't charge Bells.
If there's a bug you want me to sculpt, bring me of them.
Commission a piece.
Explain that again?
I'm good for now.

O-of course! I would explain my purpose a THOUSAND times, because my purpose is bugs! I sculpt icons of them, though my work can only be as shadows cast on the wall of a cave. I also take commissions from fellow bug lovers. I don't accept Bells, but I do need live models to work from.
Yes! I'll be happy to—WAIT. You are not ready. You have not yet completed your rites of devotion. Dedicate yourself to catching of your chosen bug. When they have deemed you worthy, see me again.
Oh, I see. The time has come for we two travelers to begin our journey together.What bug have you chosen to act as our guide?
Noble ! Can you part with of them? They will be happy and safe with me.
Yes, please!
Eh, never mind.

Scored a commission! I mean, um AND SO OUR CONTRACT IS BOUND, HUMAN.Already I feel the all-consuming fires of the creative inferno warming my be-coldened blood! When I have completed my labors as midwife to the muse, I'll ship you the by mail.
WHAT?! B-butmy creative spark just set fire to the drapes of my mind!No, it's OK. I'll be here if you change your mind or anything.
May you one day find your own path to infestation.
Of course. You're wondering about your piece. How could you not? Patience, bell cricket! I will forge for you a colossus that will bestride the world like a bug!<10_4 /> It'll come in the mail.

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? Fell juggernaut of the backyard? It is the exquisite intersection of mighty strength and graceful grace! Plus those cool white markings! I promise this will be my gigantic-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Goliath Beetle!

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? Reaping shears of the netherworld? Those twin razory scythes that slice into foes! Those crimson eyes that bore into your very soul! I promise this will be my intense-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Giraffe Stag Beetle!

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? The angel that flaps among us? These glorious spirits are like lenses through which we can see the purity of the Infested Realms. I promise this will be my sublime-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Queen Alexandra's Birdwing!

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? The ghost who flutters like a bug? Their brief lives are a tragedy that no one will ever hear, for they have no mouths to tell it! I promise this will be my silent-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Atlas Moth!

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? The burning scourge of the skyways? Perched on its golden hoard with the heart of a mountain and the will of a glacier, it is fury given form! I promise this will be my fiery-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Banded Dragonfly!

R-really? You want a sculpture of ? The sublime spear of the heavens? Its mottled shell is a reflection of the negative sky of the Infested Realms it defends with its mighty horn! I promise this will be my pokey-est masterpiece, and I shall title it The Grand Horned Hercules!
When my labors are complete and you seek your sculpture, look to the postal service.
I've got a bug to sell!
Maybe another time.
Sell! Sell!
On second thought...
Commissions?
Tell me about your art.
Commission a piece.
Explain that again?
I'm good for now.
